name: Luminance Hearts
description:
Description:
Play as Light and Lumi, on their journey to save the lights from darkness.

Credits: 
- Music "Big Blue Sky" by megawolf77 
https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/234456

- Font "Frizon" by Unblast 
https://unblast.com/frizon-display-typeface/

Controls:
- Arrows / AWSD : Move
- Z / SPACE : Jump
- X / K : Attack
- UP / C / L : Pick up Lumi
- DOWN / C / L : Drop Lumi
- SHIFT / E  : Switch character
- R  : Reset
